column5: On discovery right now, seems pretty cool  http://channel.nationalgeographic.com/series/hooked/3866/Overview
i just saw it. the shark fishing from a kayak made my hair stand on end. holy crap !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Yeah that was pretty sick!!!  I liked the surf fishing for tiger sharks too.
im known to be adventurous, and a little nuts but shark fishing in a kayak on water thats 50 degrees? no Damn way in hell! lol those guys are nut jobs! great show tho.
With the sharks jumping out of the water like they were the last place I would want to be is in a yak Other than that no problemo...
i played the fishing game they have for a half hour and forgot about the vid.
Definately a crazy scenario. I thought for sure he was going to end up in the water.
